body:
### Fix the build of the `gpgme` package:

A part of the gpgme testsuite is  enabled by default during `m̀ake`.

It even runs during normal make and make install phases.

It tries to create a public keyring in `~/.gnupg` and can even fail in some cases.

#### Fix this and add the `0.16.0` release.
title: gpgme: Add 0.16.0 and address test suite issues
